#Text=Rsum de la description de poste ce poste, vous tes responsable de la conception de modules trs complexes, de composants critiques ou d'une application/d'un produit complet dans son intgralit.
#Text=Aspire  l'intgrer  plusieurs systmes.
#Text=ce poste, vous travaillez de manire indpendante et vous tes considr comme un leader technique.

#Text=ce poste, vous tes charg de diriger les efforts de... conception et de dveloppement lis  l'architecture,  l'volutivit,  la disponibilit et aux performances, conformment  la feuille de route du produit/de l'application.Description de l'emploi Can be Remote" (US)Roles and Responsibilities Be responsible for providing technical leadership and defining, developing, and evolving software in a fast paced and agile development environment using the latest software development m and infrastructure Provide guidance to developers with either planning and execution and/or design architecture using agile methodologies such as SCRUM Work with Product Line Leaders (PLLs) to understand product requirements & vision Drive increased efficiency across the teams, eliminating duplication, leveraging product and technology reuse Capture system level requirements by brainstorming with CTO, Sr.

column1: #Text=Pre-emptively sees downstream consequences and effectively tailors influencing strategy to support a positive outcome.
#Text=Uses experts or other third parties to influence.
#Text=Able to verbalize what is behind decisions and downstream implications.
#Text=Continuously reflecting on success and failures to improve performance and decision-making.
#Text=Understands when change is needed.
#Text=Participates in technical strategy planning.
#Text=Proactively identifies and removes project obstacles or barriers on behalf of the team.
#Text=Able to navigate accountability in a matrixed organization.Communicates and demonstrates a shared sense of purpose.
#Text=Learns from failure.Personal Attributes: Able to effectively direct and mentor others in critical thinking skills.
#Text=Proactively engages with cross-functional teams to resolve issues and design solutions using critical thinking and analysis skills and best practices.
#Text=Finds important patterns in seemingly unrelated information.
#Text=Influences and energizes other toward the common vision and goal.
#Text=Maintains excitement for a process and drives to new directions of meeting the goal even when odds and setbacks render one path impassable.
#Text=Innovates and integrates new processes and/or technology to significantly add value to GE.
#Text=Identifies how the cost of change weighs against the benefits and advises accordingly.

#Text=Proactively learns new solutions and processes to address seemingly unanswerable problems.Additional InformationGE offers a great work environment, professional development, challenging careers, and competitive compensation.
#Text=GE is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

#Text=Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.The salary range for this position is $136,000.00 - 204,000.00 USD Annual.
#Text=The specific salary offered to a candidate may be influenced by a variety of factors including the candidates experience, their education, and the work location.
#Text=In addition, this position is eligible for a performance bonus.
#Text=Available benefits include be Health, Medical, 401K, Paid Leave.
